questionText.text: For the relation Apply(SSN,cName,state,date,major), suppose college names are unique and students may apply to each college only once, so we have two FDs: cName ---> state and SSN,cName --->  date,major. Is Apply in BCNF?
Consider relation Apply(SSN,cName,state,date,major) with FDs cName ---> state and SSN,cName ---> date,major. What schema would be produced by the BCNF decomposition algorithm?
